title: AnimationTrackEasingConfig
description: An instance of an animation track.

default.title: Default
default.description:
The default easing to apply; available values are :
  • linear
  • easeInSine
  • easeInOutSine
  • easeOutSine
  • easeInQuad
  • easeInOutQuad
  • easeOutQuad
  • easeInCubic
  • easeInOutCubic
  • easeOutCubic
  • easeOutBounce
  • easeInBounce
Default is linear.

start.title: Start
start.description: The time (in ms) to reach the first position of the track from the current position of the camera.
